feed.title: GitHub Python Daily Trending

entry.title: greghesp/ha-bambulab
entry.summary:
A Home Assistant Integration for Bambu Lab Printers

Bambu Lab

A Home Assistant Integration for Bambu Lab printers.

Full documentation for the integration can be found here

Join us on Discord

Contribution

Want to contribute to ha-bambulab?

If you feel this integration was valuable and want to support it in other ways, you can buy me a coffee.

Setup

For more information on setting up and configuring ha-bambulab, please read our full documentation
